channel.title: Ordnance Survey on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Ordnance Survey on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Stonehenge = Made in the Preselis
item.description: This morning was going to be a another great day for hiking as the skies were clear and there was no rain forecast for the whole day. I was, again, following the great book Walking in Pembrokeshire - 41 circular walks in the National park. By the way, this was walk no 21: Carn Menyn and the »Bluestones«. It took me a bit to find the correct site for parking as I kept switching between the book and the Ordnance survey map.
